solution_line_template: Debbie used {tape_per_large_box_seal} * {num_large_boxes} = <<{tape_per_large_box_seal}*{num_large_boxes}={tape_large_boxes_seal}>>{tape_large_boxes_seal} feet of tape for the large boxes.
She used {tape_per_medium_box_seal} * {num_medium_boxes} = <<{tape_per_medium_box_seal}*{num_medium_boxes}={tape_medium_boxes_seal}>>{tape_medium_boxes_seal} feet of tape for the medium boxes.
She used {tape_per_small_box_seal} * {num_small_boxes} = <<{tape_per_small_box_seal}*{num_small_boxes}={tape_small_boxes_seal}>>{tape_small_boxes_seal} feet of tape for the small boxes.
She used {tape_per_label} * {total_boxes} = <<{tape_per_label}*{total_boxes}={tape_for_labels}>>{tape_for_labels} feet of tape for the address labels.

Thus, she used {tape_large_boxes_seal} + {tape_medium_boxes_seal} + {tape_small_boxes_seal} + {tape_for_labels} = <<{tape_large_boxes_seal}+{tape_medium_boxes_seal}+{tape_small_boxes_seal}+{tape_for_labels}={total_tape_used}>>{total_tape_used} feet of tape in all.
